name: k6-api-testing-framework
description: A comprehensive, dockerized K6 framework for functional and load testing of REST APIs.

scripts.docker:build: npm run generate:payloads && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml build
scripts.test:docker: npm run generate:payloads && dotenv -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml run --rm -e API_TARGET -e SCRIPT_NAME -e Env k6 run $SCRIPT_NAME --out json=- | node tools/format-results.js
scripts.test:local: npm run generate:payloads && dotenv -- k6 run -e API_TARGET=$API_TARGET -e ENV=${Env:-beta} $SCRIPT_NAME --out json=- 2>&1 | node tools/format-results.js
